did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Early History of the University of Arizona, 1922
did.abstract: Typescript of address delivered at the University of Arizona, March 12, 1922, at the first celebration of "Founders' Day", concerning the establishment of the University of Arizona.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Typescript of address delivered at the University of Arizona, March 12, 1922, at the first celebration of "Founders' Day", concerning the establishment of the University of Arizona.

relatedmaterial.p: Related material at Selim Maurice Franklin Papers, 1873-1927 (AZ 336).
